name: LNP™ VERTON™ Compound MVL36SX0
description: LNP™ VERTON™ Compound MVL36SX0 combines polypropylene (PP) resin with 30% long glass fibers and PTFE, offering a robust solution for structural applications. This compound is chemically coupled for enhanced performance, heat stabilized to maintain strength across temperature variations, and boasts wear-resistant properties. It is designed to withstand outdoor conditions with UV stability, making it suitable for automotive exteriors, water management systems, and various industrial applications. LNP™ VERTON™ Compound MVL36SX0 delivers high stiffness and strength, ensuring durability and reliability in sport and leisure equipment, home appliances, and commercial appliances. Ideal for injection molding processes, it provides excellent dimensional stability and processability, meeting the demanding requirements of modern manufacturing.
